attributes.action: Define BREXIT Migrant policy to defuse racist attacks on EU & Non-EU Migrants
attributes.additional_details:
Many incidents reported, as follows:

http://metro.co.uk/2016/06/25/is-this-what-bame-people-have-to-look-forward-to-post-brexit-5965720/

http://www.express.co.uk/news/uk/683448/Brexit-EU-Referendum-Vote-Racist-Polish-Muslim-Eastern-European-Flyer-Cambridgeshire

There is plenty more evidence on Facebook and Twitter of personally reported incidents of British Citizens, EU & Non-EU Migrants suffering racist abuse, from people who clearly do not know what the Leave vote means for these people.
attributes.background: Since BREXIT there's been a significant number of incidents reported of people using "we voted out" in racist attacks on both EU AND non-EU migrants, and British Citizens of non-white ethnicity.  We, the undersigned, want OFFICIAL migrant rights policy communicated, to defuse this behaviour.
